content: धार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धृ-णिच्-अच्] {@--1@} Holding, bearing, supporting. {@--2@} Streaming, dripping, flowing. --रः {@--1@} An epithet of Viṣṇu. {@--2@} A sudden and violent shower of rain, sharp-driving shower. {@--3@} Snow, hail. {@--4@} A deep place. {@--5@} Debt. {@--6@} A boundary, limit. {@--7@} A sort of stone.
